quoteText:
YOU AND MetaCafe AGREE THAT ANY CAUSE OF ACTION ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THE METACAFE WEB SITE MUST COMMENCE WITHIN ONE (1) YEAR AFTER THE CAUSE OF ACTION ACCRUES.
OTHERWISE, SUCH CAUSE OF ACTION IS PERMANENTLY BARRED.
title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

tosdr.case: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
